content.text: 1/2 cup butter
content.eamr: ( ing-0 "1/2 cup butter" )

content.text: 1 cup water
content.eamr: ( ing-1 "1 cup water" )

content.text: 1 cup all-purpose flour
content.eamr: ( ing-2 "1 cup all-purpose flour" )

content.text: 1/4 teaspoon salt
content.eamr: ( ing-3 "1/4 teaspoon salt" )

content.text: 4 eggs
content.eamr: ( ing-4 "4 eggs" )

content.text: 1 (5 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix
content.eamr: ( ing-5 "1 (5 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix" )

content.text: 2 1/2 cups cold milk
content.eamr: ( ing-6 "2 1/2 cups cold milk" )

content.text: 1 cup heavy cream
content.eamr: ( ing-7 "1 cup heavy cream" )

content.text: 1/4 cup confectioners' sugar
content.eamr: ( ing-8 "1/4 cup confectioners' sugar" )

content.text: 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
content.eamr: ( ing-9 "1 teaspoon vanilla extract" )

content.text: 2 (1 ounce) squares semisweet chocolate
content.eamr: ( ing-10 "2 (1 ounce) squares semisweet chocolate" )

content.text: 2 tablespoons butter
content.eamr: ( ing-11 "2 tablespoons butter" )

content.text: 1 cup confectioners' sugar
content.eamr: ( ing-12 "1 cup confectioners' sugar" )

content.text: 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
content.eamr: ( ing-13 "1 teaspoon vanilla extract" )

content.text: 3 tablespoons hot water
content.eamr: ( ing-14 "3 tablespoons hot water" )

content.text: 0) Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "450 degrees F"@19:32 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "230 degrees C"@34:47 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Grease a cookie sheet.
2) In a medium saucepan, combine 1/2 cup butter and 1 cup water.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "combine"@25:32 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "1/2 cup butter"@33:47 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "1 cup water"@52:63 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-2-0 "a medium saucepan"@6:23 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Bring to a boil, stirring until butter melts completely.
4) Reduce heat to low, and add flour and salt.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Reduce"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( "heat"@10:14 / OTHER )
		:gol ( temp-4-0 "low"@18:21 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
	:inform ( ac-4-1 "add"@27:30 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "flour"@31:36 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "salt"@41:45 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Stir vigorously until mixture leaves the sides of the pan and begins to form a stiff ball.
6) Remove from heat.
7) Add eggs, one at a time, beating well to incorporate completely after each addition.
8) With a spoon or a pastry bag fitted with a No. 10, or larger, tip, spoon or pipe dough onto cookie sheet in 1 1/2 x 4 inch strips.
content.eamr:
( inst-8 / R
	:inform ( ac-8-0 "tip, spoon or pipe"@65:83 / AC
		:ppt ( "dough"@84:89 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-8-0 "cookie sheet"@95:107 / TOOL )
		:instrument ( "or"@-1:-1 / CHOICE
			:op ( tool-8-1 "a spoon"@8:15 / TOOL )
			:op ( tool-8-2 "a pastry bag"@19:31 / TOOL )
		)
		:reshape ( "1 1/2 x 4 inch strips"@111:132 / OTHER )
	)
)

content.text: 9) Bake 15 minutes in the preheated oven, then reduce heat to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C) and bake 20 minutes more, until hollow sounding when lightly tapped on the bottom.
content.eamr:
( inst-9 / R
	:inform ( ac-9-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:duration ( dur-9-0 "15 minutes"@8:18 / DUR )
		:loc ( tool-9-0 "the preheated oven"@22:40 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-9-1 "reduce"@47:53 / AC
		:ppt ( "heat"@54:58 / OTHER )
		:heat ( temp-9-0 "165 degrees C"@77:90 / TEMPERATURE )
		:gol ( temp-9-1 "325 degrees F"@62:75 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
	:inform ( ac-9-2 "bake"@96:100 / AC
		:duration ( dur-9-1 "20 minutes"@101:111 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-9-0 "until hollow sounding when lightly tapped on the bottom"@118:173 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 10) Cool completely on a wire rack.
11) For the filling, combine pudding mix and milk in medium bowl according to package directions.
content.eamr:
( inst-11 / R
	:inform ( ac-11-0 "combine"@21:28 / AC
		:subtask ( "For the filling"@4:19 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "pudding mix"@29:40 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "milk"@45:49 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-11-0 "medium bowl"@53:64 / TOOL )
		:mnr ( "according to package directions"@65:96 / OTHER )
	)
)

content.text: 12) In a separate bowl, beat the cream with an electric mixer until soft peaks form.
content.eamr:
( inst-12 / R
	:inform ( ac-12-0 "beat"@24:28 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-7 "the cream"@29:38 / FOOD )
		:instrument ( tool-12-0 "an electric mixer"@44:61 / TOOL )
		:until ( cond-12-0 "until soft peaks form"@62:83 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:loc ( tool-12-1 "a separate bowl"@7:22 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 13) Beat in 1/4 cup confectioners' sugar and 1 teaspoon vanilla.
content.eamr:
( inst-13 / R
	:inform ( ac-13-0 "Beat in"@4:11 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-8 "1/4 cup confectioners' sugar"@12:40 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-9 "1 teaspoon vanilla"@45:63 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 14) Fold whipped cream into pudding.
15) Cut tops off of cooled pastry shells with a sharp knife.
content.eamr:
( inst-15 / R
	:inform ( ac-15-0 "Cut"@4:7 / AC
		:ppt ( "tops"@8:12 / OTHER )
		:source ( "cooled pastry shells"@20:40 / FOOD )
		:instrument ( tool-15-0 "a sharp knife"@46:59 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 16) Fill shells with pudding mixture and replace tops.
17) For the icing, melt the chocolate and 2 tablespoons butter in a medium saucepan over low heat.
content.eamr:
( inst-17 / R
	:inform ( ac-17-0 "melt"@19:23 / AC
		:subtask ( "For the icing"@4:17 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-10 "the chocolate"@24:37 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-11 "2 tablespoons butter"@42:62 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-17-0 "a medium saucepan"@66:83 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-17-0 "low heat"@89:97 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 18) Stir in 1 cup confectioners' sugar and 1 teaspoon vanilla.
content.eamr:
( inst-18 / R
	:inform ( ac-18-0 "Stir in"@4:11 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-12 "1 cup confectioners' sugar"@12:38 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-13 "1 teaspoon vanilla"@43:61 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 19) Stir in hot water, one tablespoon at a time, until icing is smooth and has reached desired consistency.
content.eamr:
( inst-19 / R
	:inform ( ac-19-0 "Stir in"@4:11 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-14 "hot water"@12:21 / FOOD )
		:mnr ( "one tablespoon at a time"@23:47 / OTHER )
		:until ( cond-19-0 "until icing is smooth and has reached desired consistency"@49:106 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 20) Remove from heat, cool slightly, and drizzle over filled eclairs.
21) Refrigerate until serving.
